page.title: 18A PAGE BY A HEADMASTER.
page.content: MILLBROOK JUNIOR SCHOOL AIMS TO BE A HAPPY,LIVELY SCHOOL FOR WE BELIEVE THAT A CHILD'S ATTITUDE TO LEARNING IS OF THE GREATEST IMPORTANCE.THE SCHOOL SEEKS A HIGH STANDARD OF DISCIPLINE, NOT THROUGH FEAR OF PUNISHMENT BUT FROM RESPECT FOR ONE ANOTHER AND IN THE KNOWLEDGE THAT A CERTAIN CONDUCT OF BEHAVIOUR IS THE NORM.THE CURRICULUM IS BROAD,BEING BOTH ACADEMIC AND PRACTICAL,AND RELEVANT IN THAT THE PUPILS'TASKS ARE NOT DIVORCED FROM THE WORLD OUTSIDE SCHOOL. IT IS OUR INTENTION THAT THE TASKS GIVEN TO PUPILS SHOULD MATCH THEIR MATURITY AND INTELLIGENCE IN ORDER TO CAPITALISE THE POTENTIAL OF THE INDIVIDUAL.IT IS AN OPEN SCHOOL,WELCOMING PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT AND ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO SUPPORT BOTH THEIR CHILD AND THEIR CHILD'S TEACHER. TIMOTHY MASSEY.HEAD MILLBROOK JUN SCH.
